price: Yeryüzünde dört ay daha dolaşabilirsiniz. Allah'ı (size azap etmekten) aciz bırakamayacağınızı, Allah’ın kâfirleri rezil edeceğini bilin!
arabic: فَسِيحُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُرٖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِي ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡزِي ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fasīḥū fī al-arḍi arbaʿata ashhurin wa-iʿ'lamū annakum ghayru muʿ'jizī al-lahi wa-anna al-laha mukh'zī al-kāfirīna
